===Alternative forms===
* {{ja-l|識神}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=しきがみ|式|tr1=shiki|t1=ceremony|神|tr2=kami|t2=god, spirit}}. The ''kami'' changes to ''gami'' due to {{rendaku|しきがみ}}.

Alternately, compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=しきじん|式|tr1=shiki|t1=ceremony|神|tr2=jin|t2=god, spirit}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|しきがみ|acc=h|acc2=2|y=j}}
{{ja-pron|しきじん|acc=h|acc2=2|y=go}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しきがみ|しきじん}}

# A kind of [[familiar]] [[spirit]], summoned-up in service as a [[servant]] to the [[will]] of a [[practitioner]] of the [[onmyōdō]] ({{l|ja|陰陽道}}) religion, very much like a [[western]] familiar.
